allow: Bash(psql grape_dev -c 'GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA public TO ""user"";')
Bash(psql grape_dev -c 'ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON TABLES TO ""user"";')
Bash(psql grape_dev -c 'ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON SEQUENCES TO ""user"";')
Bash(psql grape_dev -c "UPDATE fruit_templates SET seventh_status = ''/images/tangie1.svg'' WHERE id = ''1a00a17e-2f9f-41f4-8dad-25dee29e1b18'';")
Bash(psql grape_dev -c "SELECT id, name, seventh_status FROM fruit_templates WHERE id = ''1a00a17e-2f9f-41f4-8dad-25dee29e1b18'';")
Bash(psql grape_dev -c "SELECT id, name, status, seventh_status FROM fruits WHERE fruit_template_id = ''1a00a17e-2f9f-41f4-8dad-25dee29e1b18'' LIMIT 5;")
Bash(psql grape_dev -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''fruits'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
